metadata.name: No war, please!
metadata.description:
NO WAR, please !!!🙏🏻🇺🇦
 I drew this portrait while sitting in a shelter.  And ran into it to the sound of deaf explosions.
 ⠀⠀
 On February 24, at 5:00 am, Russia attacked Ukraine when everyone was asleep.

 It hurts me that political issues are resolved in such a way.
 ⠀
 People are not to blame for anything!
 I AM AGAINST ANY WAR.

money from the sale = help and support for victims in Ukraine
